title: ISCC Certification Body Credential
description: This schema defines a Verifiable Credential with the ISCC recognition details of a Certification Body (CB). It only contains domain-specific claims and is intended to be combined with a base SD-JWT VC layer by the wallet or ecosystem.

vct.description: The Verifiable Credential Type (VCT) that identifies this ISCC Certification Body credential. Required. Example: urn:org:iscc.iscc-cb:1

cbName.description: The official name of the ISCC Certification Body (CB). Required. Example: DEKRA Certification B.V.

cbId.description: The ISCC-internal Certification Body identifier or another stable ID used by ISCC to reference this CB. Required. Example: ISCC-CB-220

legalPersonId.description: The official registration identifier of the Certification Body, such as EUID, VAT number, or Chamber of Commerce number. Optional. Example: NL123456789B01

isccSchemes.description: The ISCC schemes for which this Certification Body is officially recognised. Required. Typical values include: ISCC EU, ISCC PLUS, ISCC CORSIA.

recognitionStatus.description: The current ISCC recognition status of the Certification Body. Required. Example: active

recognitionDate.description: The date on which the Certification Body was first recognised by ISCC for the relevant schemes. Required. ISO 8601 date format (YYYY-MM-DD). Example: 2024-05-20

recognitionExpiry.description: The expiry date of the current ISCC recognition, if applicable. ISO 8601 date format (YYYY-MM-DD). Example: 2027-05-20

regions.description: The regions and/or countries in which this Certification Body is allowed to perform ISCC audits. Values can be regional labels (e.g. EU, Europe, Global) or ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes (e.g. NL, DE). Optional.

items.description: A region label or ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

scopes.description: The audit scopes for which this Certification Body is recognised under ISCC (for example, traceability, waste & residues, GHG verification, RFNBO/SAF). Optional.

officialWebsite.description: The official website of the Certification Body. Optional. Example: https://www.dekra-certification.nl

certificateLookup.description: A public URL where ISCC certificates or audit information for this CB or its clients can be looked up. Optional. Example: https://certificates.iscc-system.org
